@Jon_Dykstra For this deal to work A) Weaver has to show he‚Äôs turned a corner and B) The front office has to maximize his value. Given the choice between both those things happening or a 26 platoon bat at a position of need, give me Rivera.

@Jon_Dykstra The chances of you flipping Weaver for a player better than Rivera in a year is small. At best you get a similar player but I liked what Rivera was doing against lefties.

@RoyalReportKev Nothing wrong with a platoon bat. Also, Eaton, Garcia and Loftin are all unknowns at the big league level. Rivera at least has a (small) sample size of cruising lefties. With lefties MJ, Pratto, Vinnie, Massey and Isbel (to a lesser extent) I wouldn‚Äôt mind having a lefty masher.
